places_with_reviews.name: KMVN Manas Hotel, Dharchula
address: 1, India - Nepal Rd, Khalanga, Dharchula, Uttarakhand 262545, India

reviews.text: Beautiful Manas hotel staff extended all possible help to the tourists. Food and service is too good. Wish to come to this place again in the future .

Hotel on the bank of the river near to Nepal boarder. Entry road is steep, narrow, conjested. It's just beside the police station. Ambience is good followed by food, staffs. Most of the rooms are river facing. No lift facility. Parking for 5-6 cars are available.
Beautiful location....sound and beauty  Kali river with its gentle breeze....makes it more lbeautiful.besic ambience ...but good.clean.quality of food is very good

Rooms are average. Riverside view is good. Very well received with hospitality but it's difficult to reach as u have to cross a busy market place with a narrow road. Wonderful staff and experience so I really loved it.

Situated on the banks of Kali river, over looking Nepal border, Kmvn. Manas has a large lobby with comfortable sofas. The spacious rooms are well furnished with a large bathroom and a balcony. It has a good restaurant providing buffet and Al a cart meals to taste.
As I was handicapped with severe cold and cough, I had to give up my plans of visiting Narayan ashram and opt out of Adi Kailash and OM parvat yatra and stay here for 10 days, 29/09 to 10/10. The manager Mr. Bishit, counter staff Ramesh Bishit and Manish, Ramesh and lalit and all other staff helped me in all respects and made my stay enjoyable and pleasent. Thank you team Manas

places_with_reviews.name: Dev Darshan Hotel
address: near Hanuman mandir, Dharchula, Uttarakhand 262545, India

reviews.text: Newly built hotel in Dharchula near KMVN Rest House. Single, Double, Triple bedded rooms with attached bathroom, hot and cold water facility available in very reasonable price. A small restaurant on first floor for in-house guests. Water dispenser for normal cold and hot drinking water free of cost self service facility available. Two single bed, five each double and triple bed rooms are in hotel.

We'd good times at this Dev hotel.very reasonable room charges, very cordial staff. Clean and we'll ventilated rooms. Even Lenen we're room utilities were cleaned up. Quick food and tea service 24/7 was really great surprise. Very near to main market and ,to Kali Ganga River, crossing bridge to Nepal during day time was very near by. I'd always love to make my stay at Dev Hotel, at Dharchula.

Best option in Dharchula. Ask for a 3rd floor room - they have bathroom, AC, fridge, TV and nice chairs. Joshi ji gave me a very decent rate (even though I am white). Immediately liked his attitude and mannerisms.

There is an open air restaurant on the roof, decent enough views. Market is friendly and easily walked.

Will stay here every time I come from now on.

very good hotel at fare price
the owner is so polite

places_with_reviews.name: Gangri Hotel
address: Gwalgaun vard, near Gangri Hotel, Dharchula, Uttarakhand 262545, India

reviews.text: Unfortunately we could not reach Dharchula due to heavy rain (IMD issued a red alert in Kumaon). So we could not stay at this hotel. However, the owner of the hotel refunded 70% of the advance payment and denied full refund in spite of our helpless situation. We shall do our best to stay here on our next opportunity to visit Dharchula. But we shall not make any advance booking here. I recommend this hotel for spot booking only. Dharchula is subject to extreme weather conditions: it suffers from frequent landslides and road blocks. So advance booking may lead to loss of money. There are several hotels and Dharchula is not a popular destination yet. You can easily get a room on arrival.
The owner of the hotel is one of the most beautiful women I have ever met. Always responds with a smiling face and with very positive attitude.
Food quality is good location good service good
Good for budget stay. At the beginning of the town.
Average rooms in affordable prices.

places_with_reviews.name: HOTEL BHAGWATI INN

reviews.text:
Exceptional and Overwhelming Experience..

Hotel Bhagwati Inn located at Galati, just 2 km before the main congested Dharchula town.The location of this property is super accessible as it is situated just beside the main road and opposite to petrol pump.One need not  stuck in jam of main Dharchula town and time may also save for searching the proper location of the property.They provide the facilities of both private rooms (AC and Non AC) and super cleaned dormitory with ample parking space.All rooms are very cozy, neat and clean with all the amenities specially clean wash room with 24 hr running hot water.  The rooftop provides awesome view of India, Nepal and Kali River.All staffs are very cooperative, helpful and humble specially Pal ji.

This place becomes very close to our heart because of the two wonderful people with golden heart i.e the owner Dr. Bangyal and Mrs. Bangyal.Last 12 years I have been traveling so many places in Himalayas but the hospitality and comfort we found there, is quite exceptional and need to be mentioned specially.Dr. Bangyal, professionally a renowned Doctor, besides his busy schedules arranged all our transportation from Lal Kuan - Dharchula - Darma Valley -Narayan Swami Ashram -Dharchula - Vridh Jageshwar to Lal Kuan and also booked a special room at Narayan Swami Ashram for us. All the drivers for our whole trip was too good and knowledgeable.Last but not the least the homemade ,delicious &super tasty light food removed all our fatigue of this hectic journey . Madam Bangyal specially prepared Mutton Curry for Us which was just out of the world.

We are really lucky to meet these amazing people and recomend everyone to choose these stay for Darma Valley, Adi Kailash and Om Parvat trip.We are egarly waiting to meet you and having loads of fun..

Great Experience.

The stay was very comfortable with delicious food. The room was spacious, the linens were clean and the mattress was comfortable. As well as private rooms, the property also offers dormitories. You will get here home cooked delicious and healthy food.

The owner of the property, Dr. Bangyal himself is a very nice and down to earth person. At our request, he also joined us for dinner and morning tea the next day.

I would always prefer to stay here rather than getting stuck in the congested traffic of Dharchula.

We stayed here for 2 days on our way to Adi Kailash and Om Parvat on Oct 2023. It was a pleasant exoerience. Hotel is conveniently located just where Dharchula city starts. One need not to go through the traffic and congestion of Dharchula city and move to yatra road. Rooms are clean. Some works are still going on to further improve the amenities. Dr Bangyal himself is maintaining everything with smiling face even after his busy professional schedule. Food is himemade and delicious and served with home like warmth.
Dr Bangyal also helped us to park our car there during our yatra. We highly recommend Dr Bangyal and his Bhagwati Inn to all the pilgrims going to this yatra.
Fantastic property. Convinient location for all amenities in Darchula. Staff are friendly.

dharchula’s best hotel for your onway visit to adi kailash , om parwat and darma valley
owners nature is very welcoming . staff is well baheved . clean rooms and good food availaible

places_with_reviews.name: Hotel new yash dharchula
address: Unnamed Road Khalanga, RGXR+HHV, Suwa, Dharchula, Uttarakhand 262545, India

reviews.text:
There were quite a things which I didn't like about the hotel. The bed was of cheap quality and broke just because of too many people sitting on it. They fixed it by supporting it through some bricks underneath. The staff was not polite. The geyser in the bathroom was also not working.
Things that I liked about the hotel was that the location was good and almost everything was within a radius of 1 km. The cleanliness of the toilet was also good.
Everything was great with fast and delecious food deleveries and nice staff but it sure is down the street
Nice staff.. guddu is the person with good knowledge. He can be your friend as well as a one stop shop for all your needs.. he is a good guide too.. will contact him every time I am in Dharchula
Excellent service n hospitality
The stay was really great and the rooms are no less than heavenly after we returned back from Darma... The people and staff were very attentive and helpfull too !
